text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Things @realDonaldTrump has more attention & care for than the thousands of people dying every week from his bungled covid-19 response:

- golf
- self-dealing
- nepotism
- twitter
- selling beans
- selling pizzas
- conspiracy theories

That's good, clear priorities, man.
